ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Robert Snelgrove for advice. We also thank the other members of the Respiratory Infections section for suggestions and critique and Caetano Reis e Sousa for critically reading the manuscript. We thank the National Institutes of Health Tetramer Core Facility for RSV M 187–195 tetramers (H-2D b/NAITNAKII). Finally, we thank Yanping Guo of the St Mary’s flow cytometry facility for her help and the staff of the St Mary’s animal facility for their assistance. F.K. was supported by a PhD Fellowship from the Wellcome Trust (109058/Z/15/Z) and C.J. and C.M. were supported by a grant from the Rosetrees Trust and the Stoneygate Trust(M370-F1).
